name: Don't Leave Me
description:
Don't leave me is a turn based puzzle game created for the Ludum dare 41 game jam in 48 hours.

Move the character by clicking nearby tiles, in later levels you control multiple characters and need to select the character you wish to move.

The web version crops the restart button, you can restart by pressing 'R'.

If you're stuck on a level you can press the 'N' key to skip it.

The game has no audio.
